cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with the exploration/exploitation dilemma in multi-armed bandit problems, which is a classic problem in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The proposed approach involves meta-learning, which is a subfield of machine learning that focuses on learning how to learn. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also involves optimization algorithms, which are commonly used in the field of data science (cs.DS). The proposed approach also involves solving an optimization problem, which is a common theme in control systems (cs.SY) and information theory (cs.IT).
